name: Simple HTML Tag Matching
description: Noticed a couple regex HTML tag matchers, don't know why they're so complicated, this is much simpler and matches html tags correctly. Even if someone decides to split the tag across multiple lines, which browsers do parse as HTML tags.
content:
Welcome to RegExr v2.0 by gskinner.com!

Edit the Expression & Text to see matches. Roll over matches or the expression for details. Undo mistakes with cmd-z. Save & Share expressions with friends or the Community. A full Reference & Help is available in the Library, or watch the video Tutorial.

Sample text for testing:
abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ
0123456789 +-.,!@#$%^&*();\/|<>"'
12345 -98.7 3.141 .6180 9,000 +42
555.123.4567	+1-(800)-555-2468
foo@demo.net	bar.ba@test.co.uk
www.demo.com	http://foo.co.uk/
http://regexr.com/foo.html?q=bar
author: kalypzo
